GachaSMods.randomInapplicable: Ship is at the s-mod limit
GachaSMods.randomPRDesc: Hullmods are selected with probability of selection proportional to their OP cost.
GachaSMods.randomTGDesc: Hullmods are split into 4 categories (d-mods, cheap mods, standard mods, hidden mods). After a category is selected, a hullmod within that category is selected with uniform probability of selection.
GachaSMods.randomCLDesc: Hullmods are selected with uniform probability of selection.
